title: An Elephant's spoiler free review of star wars
body:
To give a spoiler free review, I will list some categories and rate how I thought the movie performed in those categories in a way that does not talk about anything in the movie. at all.

Effective use of Floof: 8/10
Meme Potential: 3/10
Meme Usage: 5/10
Cheesiness: 5/10
Explodey Things: 8/10
Usage of Robots: 7/10
Character Development: 8/10
Orchestra Usage: 7/10 
Fight scenes: 7/10
CG/Graphics: 9/10
Plot Coherence: 8/10
Drama: 7/10
Waifus: 0/10
Anime: 0/10

Overall good movie, would recommend. I would not recommend it to anyone looking for waifu material though, that category was distinctly lacking, however its usage a floof was above my expectations.
